summary: Liver app project with web-based case management system
known_issues: Backend actor not available preventing case addition in web page

existing_features.title: Diagnose and fix the backend actor initialization issue that prevents the actor from being available when users attempt to add cases through the web interface
Add error boundary and user-friendly error messaging for backend actor connection failures with retry mechanism
Ensure the CaseFormDialog component properly waits for actor availability before attempting to create cases

new_feature_requests.summary: Verify that the useActor hook properly recreates the actor instance when the Internet Identity authentication state changes
